DrupalCamp Chicago 2011 will be Saturday December 10th at One North Wacker Drive in the UBS Tower
Conference Center, located in downtown Chicago next to Ogilvie Transportation Center and Union Station.

Registration costs $40 which includes a full day of programming, and lunch, but only 300 registrations are available.
Submit sessions to become a local legend or Become a Sponsor to help make this event a success.

Register Now

Register & Buy Your Ticket Today!

To guarantee a spot at this year's DrupalCamp Chicago register today. We have a maximum of 300 attendees that our venue can accommodate. Past DrupalCamp's have sold out, register now!

Submit A Session

Want to Present? Submit Your Session Today!

Submit your sessions for DrupalCamp Chicago 2011 and help grow your community. Did you know that presenting at a conference is a great way to be discovered helping you find a dream job?

Photo by: Kevron

UBS Tower Conference Center

An Entire Floor Dedicated to Drupal

DrupalCamp Chicago 2011 will be held downtown at the UBS Tower conference center at One North Wacker Street, Chicago. Very close to Metra's Ogilvie and Union train stations, loop buses, and many CTA El stops.

more
Photo by: Matthew Lechleider

Pre-Camp Training

Pre-Camp Training by Duo Consulting

Duo Consulting is offering a pre-camp training, "Drupal In a Day", a full-day hands-on introductory workshop. You'll learn your way around Drupal 7 the latest release of this popular web CMS. Separate registration and fees apply. View more training details here.

more

Submit a Session

After registration attendees are able to submit presentation proposals which will be voted on by the community. Top sessions will be selected and placed in a room based on percentage of votes. Are you ready to share your Drupal knowledge with the world?
